name: The National Messenger (IAPSOP)
content:
The National Messenger (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: The National Messenger Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: National Messenger, The. 1895 Washington, D.C. Editor: H.D. Barrett. Corporate author: National Spiritualist Association 1/1, June 1895 This was the organ of the National Spiritualist Association, begun in 1893, the predecessor of the National Spiritualist Association of Churches. It was devoted to furthering the position of the NSA in the then on-going conflict among spiritualists over the wisdom of a forming a national organization. NSAC Lily Dale. Issues:National Messenger N1 Jun 1895
